Player History
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/19/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $1,674,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1968...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 5/5/1969 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1971...
Injured on 5/31/1972 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/1973 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/27/1973 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/11/1975 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Injured on 4/23/1977 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1977 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 6/20/1980, off Don Buschhorn (NYM)...
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1987...
Injured on 9/2/1987 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 6/25/1989 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
Injured on 7/23/1992 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
